ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Again no indeed, you will soon know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Indeed you will come to know soon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: nay, again, you shall soon come to know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You shall cetainly know (about the consequences of your deeds).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Again, yes certainly, you will soon realise!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Again nay! You shall come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! Nay! you shall soon know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Again, no indeed; but soon you shall know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but ye will come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But you will soon come to know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Again lo! presently ye shall know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No indeed, soon you will know for yet another time!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Again, Nay! You shall come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Again, no indeed, you shall soon know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then no! You are going to know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [102:4] Again, no indeed! You will come to know, the evil consequences of your mutual vainglory at the moment of the extraction [of the soul], then [you will come to know] in the grave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but ye will come to know!) what will be done to you when you die!
